publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-5570.1 Ms Rosemary Byrne: School Education—As an amendment to motion (S2M-5570) in the name of Mr Brian Monteith, leave out from "plays" to end and insert "has a vital role to play in ensuring that all Scotland’s children receive an equal and quality education; believes that there is a need to ensure that all aspects of additional support needs are scrutinised by HMIE and that all children with additional support needs and their parents are invited to contribute by interview or questionnaire regarding the quality of education received, including assessments, educational plans, input into regular reviews and SQA concessions, and further believes that during every school inspection there should be at least one member of the HMIE team with a qualification and experience in teaching children with additional support needs."
